author: Philmore Harrison
comment: Very nice watch face, but need more features and complications, example step counter, weather  forecast, Heart Monitoring  etc.

author: David Lyall
comment: My go to watch face love it

author: Arif Zainal
comment: I like the biorhythm graph, but I need to more color options,  also I would love to have the current temperature at least.!!!
title: Cool but needs more customization

author: Hadi Bin Sumaida
comment: However please do add more details of the description of reading the biometers values ? Ex: what is F or B ?  Also a blacked out background would be better for screen burn and battery
title: Very interesting

author: Bryan Merrifield
comment: After some issues with syncing the watch face has finally showed up on the watch. I can recommend this app as far as I can make it there was no specific reason for the delay but all good now much thanks to the Dev. It's the only take on Biorhythm on the wear Platform and so far it's been very promising.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Hi,I've emailed.Would you please check.
Thank you.

title: A Biorythm watch

author: Max Kueng
comment: .. but I don't understand why this is running a background tank even while I'm not even using the face.
title: It's okay

author: Tony McDermott
comment: "Open Watch Face Selection" doesn't work. If your going to charge people money for an app, there shouldn't be simple bugs like that.
title: Nice concept, poor execution...
